resources.string:
This app was created with only one goal in mind, keeping track where people are. Whether it's a loved one on the other side of the globe or an adolescent out on his own during a hike. Sometimes you just want to know where they are.


No unnecessary fuss, just a location, time and name, collected in an online database.


Developed by ABBOV Automation, for more questions mail busger@gmail.com
